verbose_text: Loss of Bcl6 expression in the YFP + fraction was accompanied by significant gain in expression of Prdm1, as well as of Gata3, Tbx21, and Ifng (XREF_FIG B), but not of Foxp3 or Rorc (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), suggesting that Bcl6 was suppressing the Th1 and Th2 programs.
evidence: Bcl6 was suppressing the Th1 and Th2
